arts.ttl: 'Always difficult': Brendan Rodgers responds to Celtic Remembrance Day fan protest
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers has acknowledged the actions of the Celtic support during the scheduled minute's silence against Kilmarnock.

arts.ttl: 'Celtic result might have gone other way year ago'
arts.sum: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers praises his side's performance in their Scottish Premiership win over Kilmarnock.

arts.ttl: Celtic see off dogged Kilmarnock to return to Premiership summit
arts.sum: Celtic goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel had one his busier days of league action.

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Rangers kick off time at Hampden will be delayed fears man who is utterly sick of the baloney
arts.sum: The weans will have to play with their toys first of all and one lot of supporters will have to out-ultra the other.

arts.ttl: Gordon Dalziel says Celtic midfielder is proof that people in Scotland are too quick to judge
arts.sum: Gordon Dalziel says Scotland is too quick to judge amid form of Reo Hatate for Celtic But talking to Open Goal, he thinks people in Scotland are ‘terrible’ at judging players so quickly, as he also used Kuhn as an example after his arrival in January and struggles.

arts.ttl: Gary Lineker and Micah Richards' shout out to another Celtic hero for doing something 'fabulous' vs RB Leipzig
arts.sum: And RB Leipzig’s players and management reel from the Celtic Park mauling, the performance from the Bhoys has Gary Lineker and Micah Richards extolling some more praise for another Champions League hero of that night. The big Denmark goalkeeper was outstanding against Leipzig on Tuesday night and Lineker praised him for a ‘fabulous’ save Schmeichel made on the 71st minute to keep Celtic 2-1 up against Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Derek Ferguson states what is 'quite scary' about Celtic after James McFadden teases ex-Rangers man
arts.sum: But Ferguson feels, from a Rangers perspective, it’s ‘quite scary’ what Celtic have on offer as he lauded the club’s recruitment. Ex-Rangers man Derek Ferguson says Celtic’s bench strength is ‘quite scary’

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp bigs up Celtic and tells O'Riley he's a superfan as Alan Shearer joins the love in
arts.sum: The leading pundit spoke to the playmaker after his ice-cool winner against Manchester City

arts.ttl: Watch what Matt O'Riley almost did at full time after Brighton's win, Celtic fans will instantly recognise it
arts.sum: Celtic beating RB Leipzig is, quite rightly, the highlight of the week for every Hoops supporter but it seems that Matt O’Riley has put the icing on the cake with his return to action for Brighton this weekend. Celtic hero, O’Riley, popped up with Brighton’s winner against Man City last night after he made his Premier League debut for the seaside club.

arts.ttl: Brentford keen on Celtic winger Kuhn - gossip
arts.sum: English Premier League club consider Celtic winger as replacement for star asset as atmosphere turns sour at struggling Hibs...
